name: Cubed Heist
description:
Your cube friend has invited you to breakfast to talk about her boring life in the city, and what she’s going to do to change that. 

Credits-

Lead/Artist - Steel (Mintburrow)

Programming - Essem

Writing - Steel, Overcast

Voice - Melissa MekRose

Music - www.bensound.com 

Special Thanks to Panasonic (Happy Birthday!)

Includes-

  • 1 sprite with multiple expressions 
  • 1000 words 
  • 1 background 
  • 1 background music 
  • 1 menu background
  •  1 voice actor 
  • 1 ending
